segments.text: Good morning , Mr . Chu . Would you like me to brief your schedule for today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are scheduled to meet Mr . Thompson of ABC Company at eleven this morning . Then , you have a lunch appointment with Mr . Li . And this afternoon at four you will attend a press conference .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am afraid I can't attend the press conference due to an urgent conference with the Board of Directors at half past four .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Do you want me to cancel the reservation for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , thank you very much . In addition , do you have the marketing proposal ready ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The proposal is being repaired right now and I think it will be ready by tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1
